messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/16/2004 7:46:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
midwife1975@... writes:

Hello I'm new to homeschool. My son is ten. From the research I've
done it seems that unschooling is the best way for us and would
greatly appreciate any advice,tips and support. Thanks, Jessica<<<<

Welcome, Jessica!

We're here to answer what questions you have. Fire away!

~Kelly

messages.subject: New to homeschool
messages.msgSnippet: Hello I m new to homeschool. My son is ten. From the research I ve done it seems that unschooling is the best way for us and would greatly appreciate any
messages.messageBody:
Hello I'm new to homeschool. My son is ten. From the research I've
done it seems that unschooling is the best way for us and would
greatly appreciate any advice,tips and support. Thanks, Jessica
